Name: Evening Bow
LongDescription: Raises the chance of finding treasure after defeating enemies. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Illumise.  Finding an Evening Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
